titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG1530

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1863-1867

body.p:
Office of the Quarter-Master General
FOR THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
Frankfort, Ky., Oct 7, 1863.
To His Excellency
Thos E. Bramlette
Govr of Ky
Dear Sir

I herewith send you my report for the month of September, showing the amt of money that has come into my hands and how expended, also the report of W. T. Poynter Auditing Clerk showing the claims passed by him during that period --

Yours Resply
S G Suddarth Q M G
